input.sentences: on our trip out to the country we saw many interesting things .
the cliffs and the seashore were breathtaking .
my sister found some interesting mushrooms | but we were afraid to pick any up .
she and i took a long hike along the cliffs . i was afraid to look down !
finally we came back to town and had ice cream sundaes to celebrate a perfect day .
output.sentences: Yesterday we took a trip to the country
The image of the cliff from the seashore was breathtaking
My sister picked these large mushrooms
I wanted to hike up the cliffs but she was afraid
so we went into town and had these perfect sundaes
